I'm Hasanth

I'm an active blogger & wannabe polymath. I write articles on diverse topics and inter-link concepts to come up with new perspectives which usually go un-noticed when working in siloes.

In this blog, I share some of my personal experiences, free-reads, working-articles, for readers to get a glimpse of my premium content published on Substack & Patreon. To get access to my premium content, either on substack (or) patreon, click on the buttons below.
